Shriek.display_help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target and weakening his Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Shriek.display_target_help: The sonic Shriek has weakened you. You are more vulnerable to damage.

Scream.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening his resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Scream.display_target_help: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your Damage Resistance has been reduced.

Howl.display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack that can hit multiple enemies in an arc in front of you. Damage: Medium, Recharge: Moderate
Howl.display_target_help: The Howl has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Amplify.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You take a moment to concentrate and are much more accurate for a short while.

Sirens_Song.display_help: You send forth a subsonic pulse which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Sirens_Song.display_target_help: The Siren's Song has rendered you unconscious.
